pullRequest.title: ISPN-12388 Add CloudEvents integration module
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/ISPN-12388

Send cache entry events to a Kafka topic
Use the CloudEvents JSON format
Add a source to cache entry events
The event source is either a transaction, a command invocation id,
or null (for expiration)

nodes.bodyText: Why are you not using sdk-java v2? @tristantarrant

* Add a source to cache entry events
  The event source is either a transaction, a command invocation id,
  or null (for expiration)
